Package edu.rit.m2mp.udp

Package edu.rit.m2mp.udp provides Many-to-Many Protocol (M2MP) Channel implementations that transport M2MP packets as UDP datagrams.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
UDPChannel Class UDPChannel is the abstract base class for an M2MP Channel that uses UDP datagrams to transport M2MP packets.
UDPMulticastChannel Class UDPMulticastChannel provides a broadcast M2MP Channel that uses UDP datagrams to transport M2MP packets.
UDPUnicastChannel Class UDPUnicastChannel provides a point-to-point M2MP Channel that uses UDP datagrams to transport M2MP packets.
 

Package edu.rit.m2mp.udp Description

Package edu.rit.m2mp.udp provides Many-to-Many Protocol (M2MP) Channel implementations that transport M2MP packets as UDP datagrams.
